title: Arlene's Shrimp Dip
directions: In a medium bowl, place the small shrimp. Mash with a fork. Mix in creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™, curry powder and onion. Thoroughly blend. Garnish with paprika. Cover and chill in the refrigerator at least 45 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™
